school_name: Fashion Institute of Design and Merchandising
comments: You should come to all her classes in order to really understand the material. She moves at a fast pace & reads off her powerpoint presentations. She also does exercises from what she just taught you. She is willing to help if you ask her. This class is hard, so I say attend every class and keep up with your work!

school_name: Fashion Institute of Design and Merchandising
comments: After registering for O\'Hearns class I looked her up on rate my professor & was terrified. Math is far from my favorite subject but I actually really enjoyed her class. Expectations are clearly stated and O\'Hearn was very helpful. Don\'t miss class and keep up with HW, and you will do great!

school_name: Fashion Institute of Design and Merchandising
comments: she is very mean and judgemental she is also a crucial grader and her comments are really hurtful

school_name: Fashion Institute of Design and Merchandising
comments: Mean. Condescending. Rude. Worst teacher I\'ve ever had (including high school, four years of college, and grad school). Arbitrary grader who cannot justify why she gives you the grades she does. Makes you think FIDM just really doesn\'t care who teaches us. Unless you want someone to make you feel bad about yourself every class, stay away.

school_name: Fashion Institute of Design and Merchandising
comments: AVOID this woman if at all possible. If you are in kindergarten and are looking for someone to read to you about how to merchandise as a buyer, then fine- take her. But her presence in class is completely invalid and incredible shrill. She looks like the "other mother" from Coraline. She comes off as if she hates her job - her teaching proves it.

school_name: Fashion Institute of Design and Merchandising
comments: WORST TEACHER EVER I FEEL BAD FOR ALL WHO HAVE TO TAKE HER. SHE CLEARLY HATES HER JOB AND HER STUDENTS.
